attributes.action: Debate a motion in parliament to reject the Great Reset.
attributes.additional_details: I saw a debate on this topic was rejected. But it is only right when the second in line to our throne is promoting such a radical policy and in the national interest to debate a motion to reject it.
attributes.background: Debate a motion to reject this policy just as our Australian friend Pauline Hanson has planned to do in her country.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The UK Government and Parliament haven't adopted 'the Great Reset'. It's not clear from your petition what specific things you would like Government to commit not to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
